code: import'./App.css';import{useState}from"react";import{BrowserRouter as Router,Routes,Route,Link}from"react-router-dom";import Home from"./pages/Home.js";import Login from"./pages/Login.js";import CreatePost from"./pages/CreatePost.js";import{signOut}from"firebase/auth";import{auth}from"./firebase-config";import{jsx as _jsx,Fragment as _Fragment,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const[isAuth,setIsAuth]=useState(localStorage.getItem("isAuth"));const signUserOut=()=>{signOut(auth).then(()=>{localStorage.clear();setIsAuth(false);window.location.pathname="/login";});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Router,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("nav",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/",children:"Home"}),!isAuth?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/login",children:" Login "}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/createpost",children:" Post "}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:signUserOut,children:"Log Out"})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Routes,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Home,{isAuth:isAuth})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/login",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Login,{setIsAuth:setIsAuth,isAuth:isAuth})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/createpost",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CreatePost,{isAuth:isAuth})})]})]});}export default App;
